subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Payne, a spindly point guard from Murray State, was the fourteenth pick in the first round of the draft, higher than some players who once were rated far above him.
snippet: Payne, a spindly point guard from Murray State, was the fourteenth pick in the first round of the draft, higher than some players who once were rated far above him.
